name: Dead as Night Gel Eyeliner
description:
Rockeresque Beauty Company is proud to introduce our first professionally made custom product, jet black Vegan Gel Eyeliner! This smudge proof, waterproof, 24/7 luxe eyeliner glides on like silk. To celebrate we are offering this product in a Limited Edition container and packaging! This container comes with a synthetic makeup brush, for convenient application.

100% Vegan versus "Vegan Friendly" Vegan makeup means that nothing from an animal is used to create the product, including crushed insects and melted down animal fats. Please know such things are not needed to create a product, they are simply less expensive; therefore creating a higher profit for the companies who chose to use them. While working with our cosmetics lab, to create our first professionally made product, we were educated about the difference between 100% Vegan versus "Vegan Friendly," cosmetics. 100% vegan means exactly what it says, it is completely vegan. However, companies are legally allowed to say their product is "vegan friendly," if only a certain percentage of ingredients used are non-vegan. This is done as a marketing tactic, which we believe is misleading and wrong. We want to share this important information with our clients who wish to only use vegan products. Rockeresque promises to always provide you with 100% Vegan and Cruelty-Free cosmetics. Please visit the Cosmetics Corner section of our website to learn additional information concerning vegan makeup, cosmetic ingredients, and more! www.rockeresque.com/cosmeticscorner

Ingredients: Iron Oxides, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isododecane, Ceresin, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Microcrystalline Wax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Triethoxycaprylysilane, Propylene Carbonate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethlyhexylglycerin Net Weight 5 Grams

name: Unicorn Birthday Cake Kit
description:
The Unicorn Birthday Cake Kits are back and better than ever!

This is a purr-fect and magical gift for any loved one or Rockeresque fan. 

This kit comes with:
Unicorn Birthday Cake Loose Eye Shadow 
(sold in this kit exclusively)

Hand Decorated Cake Box

Magenta Glitter Unicorn Necklace

Magenta Glitter Unicorn Sticker



Specifications:
Each Cake Box is Uniquely decorated just for you by one of the Rockeresque Dolls!
Your Unicorn Birthday Cake loose eye shadow can be found inside. 

The Magenta Glitter Unicorn on the necklace measures approx. 3.5"x 3.5" 
The unicorn comes attached on top of a black acrylic back piece
The chain is sterling silver is measures approx 18" and has a lobster clasp for closure.

The Magenta Glitter Unicorn Sticker is 4"and is die-cut, meaning the sticker is in the shape of the actual unicorn

Unicorn Birthday Cake Loose Eye Shadow
is a vibrant unicorn pink with magenta glitter sparkles 
Can you used as: eye shadow, eye liner, blush, lip gloss, eyebrow filler or temporary hair color. 

Ingredients: Mica  77019(12001-26-2) , Titanium Dioxide 77891(13463-67-7), Magnesium Stearate 557-04-0, Carnauba Wax 
(Magenta sparkle is due to Mica, not cosmetic glitter)

This loose eye shadow is packaged in a 5 gram container which holds a net weight of approximately 1.2 grams of product.
Containers come with an easy to remove sealed sifter.
Loose eye shadows are measured by weight, not volume.

All Rockeresque Beauty Company Cosmetics are Vegan and Cruelty-Free.

name: Glitter Unicorn Sticker
description:
This 4" magenta glitter vinyl die-cut black unicorn sticker is a must have for any Rockeresque Client! 

Since is it die-cut that means this huge sticker is actually the shape of the unicorn.

name: Poison Apple
description:
Poison Apple is ruby red cosmetic glitter. 

To add extra fierceness apply over our Ruby Doo loose eye shadow. 


On the Rox cosmetic grade glitters come inside of a clear cosmetic jar with a Flip Top Sifter with a black and glitter top. 
The convenient flip top sifter helps in preventing any of your glitter from spilling or collecting in the cap. 
Gently lift the ridge to open, dose out contents, then close. 

This container is filled with 4 grams of glitter.


Ingredients: Polyethylene Terephthalate.

Cosmetic glitter regulations vary for every country and we must inform our US clients to use this product, at their own discretion, when applying immediately to the eye area. 
Please note that all cosmetic glitter, no matter where you purchase it, has this same regulation in the States. Particle sizes .002-.008 are eye approved in other countries. Glitter of larger particle sizes are never recommended for eye use. Have questions about glitter? We are here for You so don't be shy to email us
info@rockeresque.com

name: Angled Eyeliner and Brow Brush
description:
Enjoy using this angled brush, with a pearl pink handle to create perfectly lined eyes with either gel liner or our loose eye shadow. You can also use this brush to fill in eyebrows, making a more defined look. 

You can use any Rockeresque Loose Eye Shadows as both eyeliners or eyebrow fillers!

To create an eyeliner: put a small amount of aqua on your angled brush, add your Rockeresque loose eye shadow and then apply! Some of our most popular shadows used as liners are: Popsicle, Hula Hoop, Sparrow, Vicious Teddy Bear, Dead as Night, and Tear Drop!

To create an eyebrow filler: add any loose shadow of your angled brush and then apply (dry or wet) 
Brown Brows: Pudding Pop, Jujubee, Cocoa Bang Bang, Gingerbread Cookie, or Vicious Teddy Bear
Ginger Haired Dolls: we recommend mixing Ruby Doo with Jack-o-Lantern to create your purr-fect shade
Blue Brows: Sparrow or Icicle
Pink Brows: XOXO, Schoolyard Crush or Misshapes
Purple Brows: Hula Hoop or Tea Cup


Measurements: 5.78 inch (146.8 mm) 
Material:	Nylon, Aluminum, Wood 


All Rockeresque makeup brushes are 100% vegan. 
This means no hair or fur from any animals are used in the bristles.

name: Powder Brush
description:
Enjoy using this large pink dome-shaped powder brush, with a pearl pink handle, to apply your face powder or favorite bronzer.


You can also use this brush to apply Rockeresque Loose Eye Shadows to your hair! 

Directions: Add any Rockeresque loose eye shadow to this brush, then rub the color into your hair. The color sets in and gives the appearance of being naturally dyed. To remove, simply rinse with shampoo.

You could have hot pink highlights for a day using XOXO, lavender bangs with Tea Cup, or even use a brown color such as Vicious Teddy Bear to touch up your roots if you haven't had time to dye them yet!


Measurements:	6.75 inch (171.5 mm)

name: Charm Bracelet
description:
For our Rockeresque's clients, you can now wear Rockeresque on your wrist!

Charm bracelets are here and are a permanent staple on our website. The sterling silver 7.5" chain with lobster claw clasp comes with two charms with purchase. 

Over time we add new charms to be purchased separately on our website so you can keep adding to your bracelet! 

The two charms that come with your chain are a pink lightning bolt and a black broken heart. Charms come attached to the chain and your bracelet comes inside of a leopard print box.

name: Vicious Teddy Bear Charm
description:

This charm comes with a sample of our loose eye shadow, Vicious Teddy Bear and is packaged inside of a miniature leopard print box.


This charm is handmade exclusively for Rockeresque by Cute-n-Sweet Cafe
http://www.etsy.com/shop/cutensweetcafe

name: Broken Tooth Charm

name: Magical Rainbow Minnie
description:
We are so happy to introduce our new Magical Rainbow Minnie! By customer request we created a Minnie that includes a sample of every one of our wonderful loose eye shadows!

We thought long and hard about a new way to offer our samples to you and we came up with our Rockeresque Minnie Kits.

This kit comes inside of a black box with white polka dots. The outside of the box is decorated with ribbons. This box holds 40 loose eye shadow samples in sample bags- labeled with names and ingredients. A glitter unicorn sticker can also be found inside waiting for you!







*Unicorn Birthday Cake is not in this kit as it not part of our main collection
**there is approx. half a gram of product in each sample bag

description:

This kit comes with a selection of our pastel and cute as a button eye shadows in: bubblegum pink, chicklet yellow, orange, peppermint green, icicle blue, and lavender. 


Not only for your beautiful eyes, we recommend using these colors with an angled brush and a tiny bit of aqua to create a custom eyeliner.

You can also use these colors wet or dry with an angled brush to create a custom eyebrow filler. Ever wonder how we get those blue or pink eyebrows? This is how!

We thought long and hard about a unique way to offer our samples to you and we came up with our Rockeresque Minnie Kits.

name: Ruby Doo Loose Eyeshadow
description:
Ruby Doo is a fierce deep vegan cranberry red packed with shimmer and punch. It is one of our personal favorites! Besides eyeshadow this product is encouraged to be used as: blush, lip gloss, hair color, nail polish and eyeliner. Are you a ginger? Mix Ruby Doo with Jack-o-Lantern to create your purr-fect eyebrow filler.
You can choose from two different sizes! Our Standard Minnie loose eyeshadow is packaged in a 5 gram container which holds a net weight of approximately 1.2 grams. You can also purchase our Pro Size which is packaged in a 10 gram container and holds a net weight of 2.2 grams of product. This size is ideal for makeup artists, models and makeup gurus! Both container options come with a sealed sifter. Loose eyeshadows are measured by weight, not volume.
Ingredients: Mica 77019, Titanium Dioxide 77891, Iron Oxide 77491, Magnesium Stearate 557-04-0, Carnauba Wax
All Rockeresque Beauty Company Cosmetics are Vegan and Cruelty-Free.
